content: It’s pretty cool that you are here with us, Robby. I’ve started using zsh (and oh-my-zsh) two weeks ago, but I’m nowhere near being even an intermediate shell user — I just like to customize my stuff and make my experience more effortless — your config has been a huge help in my shell journey — I wish I knew how to contribute to your repository! I’m planning to embrace a few new languages this summer and I’ll try to come up with a useful pull request to show my support.
